# DeviceActivityData

**Structure**

Represents the activity of a [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/User-swift.struct] on a particular [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/Device-swift.struct].

## Declaration

```swift
struct DeviceActivityData
```

## Structures

- **DeviceActivityData.ActivitySegment**: Represents the user’s activity during a particular date interval.
- **DeviceActivityData.ApplicationActivity**
- **DeviceActivityData.CategoryActivity**: A categorized representation of a user’s application and web domain activity.
- **DeviceActivityData.Device**: A device for which to report activity data.
- **DeviceActivityData.User**
- **DeviceActivityData.WebDomainActivity**

## Instance Properties

- **activitySegments**: The activity of the user divided into segments.
- **device**: The device associated with the activity report.
- **lastUpdatedDate**: The date when the system last updated the data for this device.
- **segmentInterval**: The segment interval of each [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/ActivitySegment] in [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/activitySegments].
- **user**: The user associated with the activity report.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
